en: Carefree Bomber Girl
trans: 天真爆破少女

en: An energetic girl named Clarisse helps the crew with a monster-hunting mission. While they celebrate their victory, she hears about the crew's journey and tells 姬塔 she wants to join.
jp: 一个名叫克拉莉丝，精力充沛的女孩帮助骑空团执行了一项讨伐委托。在庆功会上，她听说骑空团的旅程后告诉姬塔她想加入。

en: Ugh... I wonder how long our backup plans to keep us waiting.
trans: 呃……我想知道增援是要让我们等多久。

en: They should have been here by now. I wonder if they got lost.
trans: 他们应该已经到了。我想也许是迷路了。

en: The crew has undertaken a mission to hunt down monsters running rampant in the mountains of a certain island.
trans: 在一座岛上，骑空团接受了一个讨伐山中成群魔物的委托。

en: But they've heard that there are too many monsters to handle alone, so they've arranged to meet with some backup before proceeding.
trans: 但是他们听说魔物太多以致难以独自解决，所以他们决定先叫来一些援军再继续前进。

en: I'm getting sick of waiting... Why don't we just move on already?
trans: 我不想再等了……不如我们继续前进吧？

en: Huh? Who's that behind you?
trans: 咦？你背后的人是谁？

en: Who in the world could it be?
trans: 会是谁呐☆

en: Why don't you tell us?
trans: 是谁？

en: You're late.
trans: 你迟到了。

en: Well? Who do you think I am? Tee-hee...
trans: 猜猜看我是谁？嘻嘻...

en: Um, excuse me... Who are you, really?
trans: 嗯，对不起……你到底是谁？

en: Fine... I guess I'll give it away. I'm Clarisse, the adorable alchemy prodigy! Yay!
trans: 好吧……算了。我是美少女炼金术士克拉莉丝！耶！

en: Whoa now! If you were any crabbier, you'd have claws! Are you just at that age?
trans: 哇奥，竟然这么生气，你到了那个微妙的年纪了吗？

en: Um... Who might you be?
trans: 当然咯！你以为会是谁？

en: Whoops! Sorry! I guess I should just introduce myself.
trans: 唔！抱歉!或许我应该先自我介绍一下。

en: I'm Clarisse, the adorable alchemy prodigy! Yay!
trans: 呼哈哈！我是美少女炼金术士克拉莉丝！耶！

en: I feel dumb even asking this... but are you our backup for this mission, little girl?
trans: 虽然说起来很怪……但是小姑娘你就是我们讨伐魔物的援军吗？

en: Sure am! Who did you think would show up?
trans: 当然可以！你认为谁会出现？

en: Well... maybe someone who looks a little stronger for starters.
trans: 嗯嗯……至少比新人看上去再强一点点的那种……

en: Oh. I suppose I do look like a run-of-the-mill sweetie pie at first glance.
trans: 啊哈。了解了解，我自己也知道第一眼看上去我就是个普通的美少女嘛。

en: Um... Are you our only backup then?
trans: 嗯……我们的增援只有克拉莉丝小姐一个人吗？

en: Yep! And it's a good thing too, because two or three people like me would be way too annoying!
trans: 对！而且这也是件好事，因为我这样的人再有两三个会很烦的！

en: (I wonder if she knows how annoying she is all on her own...)
trans: （她倒是知道自己有多吵……）

en: Well, all hands are accounted for, so let's do some hunting! Um...
trans: 好，所有的人手都到齐啦，那么我们出发讨伐魔物吧！嗯...

en: Oh! I'm Lyria, and this is Vyrn.
trans: 哦!我是露莉亚，这是阿碧。

en: And this is 姬塔, the captain of our crew.
trans: 还有，这是我们骑空团的团长姬塔。

en: Okay! I know I was late, so I'll try to make up for lost time!
trans: 我知道我迟到了，所以我会尽力弥补损失的时间！

en: Hey! Slow down! We're going too, y'know! Hurry, 姬塔!
trans: 嘿!等一下！我们快跟上，快点，姬塔！

en: Grrr...
trans: 呜呜呜....

en: Ha-ha! Oh my! There are so many of them!
trans: 哼哼♪~哼哼♪~！！竟然有这么多！

en: And they all look so strong!
trans: 而且这些魔物，看上去都好强！

en: What should we do? There are even more than we thought... Maybe we should regroup...
trans: 该..该怎么办？魔物比想象中还要多……或许我们该重整下再来……

en: It's all good! Just try to stay out of the way of my fireworks!
trans: 没问题啦！注意，离我的烟火远一点哦☆~

en: Huh? What do you mea—
trans: 咦？什么意思？

en: Boom!
trans: ☆BOOM☆！

en: Whoa... What the heck was that?
trans: 刚..刚发生了什么？

en: Double boom!
trans: ☆DOUBLE☆BOOM☆!

en: Huh? Where'd all the monsters go?
trans: 咦？那些魔物都去哪儿了？

en: Aw yeah! Now I'm fired up! Let's go pop some more of these critters.
trans: 哦哦哦~热血沸腾啦！接下来是这些☆

en: Using a mysterious technique, Clarisse blows the monsters away one after another.
trans: 克拉莉丝运用一种不可思议的方法，魔物接二连三的消失了。

en: Before long there are no signs of monsters anywhere.
trans: 很快，周围已经感受不到魔物的气息了。

en: All right! Does that just about do it?
trans: 好吧！这就结束了？

en: Hey! There's hardly anything left of the mountain either!
trans: ...山上已经什么东西都看不到了！

en: Uh-oh... We might get in trouble for this later...
trans: 呃……我们可能遇到麻烦了……

en: We'll be fine. I already cleared it with the client!
trans: 没事哒☆，委托不是已经完成了嘛~

en: As a matter of fact, the client plans to develop this land, so clearing the way was part of my mission.
trans: 实际上，委托者计划开发这里，所以任务也包括了清理道路。

en: Oh! Straggler sighted!
trans: 哦! 残存的魔物☆

en: Let's wrap up our mission and go party! Sound good, 姬塔?
trans: 回去报告任务吧！怎么样，姬塔？

en: Hey! Great. She ran off on her own again.
trans: 喂!唉...又让她跑掉了。

en: We should go help her! Come on, 姬塔!
trans: 我们应该去帮她吧！来吧，姬塔！

en: If we don't stop her from getting carried away, who knows what could happen!
trans: 如果我们让她再这么得意忘形下去，不知道会发生什么！

en: Well done, everyone!
trans: 大家辛苦啦！

en: Likewise!
trans: 大家辛苦啦！

en: Ugh... This girl's such a pain...
trans: 呃……这个女孩真令人伤脑筋……

en: With the mission complete, Clarisse practically forces the crew to raise a toast with her in celebration.
trans: 任务顺利完成，在庆功会上，克拉莉丝吵着和骑空团员一一和她干杯。

en: You know what? I think fate brings people together on missions.
trans: 你知道吗☆ 我认为是命运指引我们在一起执行任务的。

en: So I always celebrate with my team once the job is done, even if it's just by having tea.
trans: 所以，我喜欢在任务完成后同伴一起庆祝，即使是一起喝茶。

en: Really? That sounds like fun!
trans: 唉？听起来好有趣！

en: It is! And it gives you a chance to hear the most interesting stories from the most incredible people!
trans: 没错☆能了解好多有趣的人和有趣的事！

en: I grew up in a pretty isolated home, so I like hearing about lots of new things!
trans: 我在一个被隔离开的地方长大，所以我超喜欢很多新鲜的事物！

en: So... What did you do to take down all those monsters exactly?
trans: 那么，刚刚讨伐魔物的时候，你究竟……做了什么？

en: Oh, that? I just used a little alchemy... though I suppose mine is somewhat unorthodox.
trans: 哦
column5: 那个？只不过是炼金术……虽然感觉上有点不正统。"

en: Alchemy?
trans: 炼金术吗？

en: Yep! But I can't do it exactly right, to be totally honest.
trans: 是的！但是说起来，我做的其实并不规范。

en: Whenever I try, the alchemical transmutation comes to a halt at some point in the middle, while the substance in question is still unstable.
trans: 每当我尝试时，炼金术在嬗变过程生成新物质之前突然停止，而所生成的物质却不稳定。

en: But substances can't stay in an unstable state for long... They eventually explode.
trans: 但物质不能长时间处于不稳定状态……它们最终会崩坏，爆炸。

en: Sorry! Sorry! I don't want to bore you with all the gory details!
trans: 抱歉!抱歉!我并不想说的这么残酷、详细...

en: Um... It's not boring, but it is a little hard to understand.
trans: 嗯……这个虽然并不无聊，不过确实有些难以理解。

en: I hear that! It was all gibberish to me at first too.
trans: 没关系！最开始这些对我来说也是难以理解的。

en: My ancestor was actually the sister of the Matriarch—the founder of alchemy—so I was brought up as an alchemist.
trans: 我的祖先实际上是炼金术创始人的妹妹，所以我被培养成了炼金术士。

en: But even though they were blessed with the founder of alchemy, that house—
trans:
但即使他们得到了炼金术创始人的祝福，那个房子……
88,Actually
column5: never mind all that! It's way too dark!"
column7: 呐，不过没什么啦！这些话题太沉重啦。

en: Now it's my turn to ask questions! Why are you all traveling?
trans: 该轮到我提问了！你们是为了什么而旅行？

en: We're going to the Island of the Astrals!
trans: 我们要去星之岛！

en: The Island of the Astrals?
trans: 星之岛？

en: 姬塔 and company tell Clarisse about their journey, though they avoid mentioning that the empire is after them.
trans: 姬塔和同伴告诉克拉莉丝他们的旅程，尽量避免提到帝国正在追捕他们。

en: Wow! That is so interesting! It really is! Can I go with you?
trans: 哇！好有趣！真的吗！我可以跟你们一起吗？

en: Huh? Where did that come from all of a sudden?
trans: 咦？突然说这种话？

en: And why would you want to travel with us?
trans: 克拉莉丝小姐，你为什么想和我们一起旅行？

en: Well... I do have my reasons...
trans: 嗯……我确实有我旅行的理由……

en: I'm actually looking for someone... Or well, my family wants me to hunt someone down.
trans: 我其实正在寻找一个人……或者说我的家人希望我去找。

en: But it's a bit of a pain, so I figure it's no big deal...
trans: 只是会有一点痛苦，不过我认为也没什么大不了的……

en: No big deal? Are you really sure about that?
trans: 没什么大不了？你真的确定吗？

en: It'll be fine! Please... you've just got to bring me with you!
trans: 没关系！拜托……你们一定要带我一起走！

en: Sure thing.
trans: 没问题。

en: There are conditions.
trans: 有条件。

en: Yay! You're the best, 姬塔!
trans: 太好啦！你最好了?，姬塔！

en: Conditions? I sure hope it's nothing too annoying...
trans: 条件？我当然希望没有什么太烦人的事情……

en: I think the captain wants you to finish what you set out to do too.
trans: 我想姬塔也会希望你完成你要做的事情。

en: I see... I guess I'll do my best with that too then!
trans: 明白了...那么我也要加油啦！

en: I'll make sure you're glad to have an adorable alchemy prodigy like me along!
trans: 我相信你们会很开心和我这样的美少女炼金术士一起的☆。

en: Thus the alchemist Clarisse is welcomed into the crew by 姬塔 and company.
trans: 于是，姬塔和同伴欢迎炼金术士克拉莉丝加入骑空团。

en: But they'll continue to find it almost impossible to keep up with her pace.
trans: 只不过他们依旧跟不上她的节奏。
